reviews.review_msg: Midterm and Final were hard, but fair and were marked fair. Hard marker for participation and group project. Lecture is her reading off walls of notes in her PowerPoint. Get ready to spend the entire class writing/typing the notes. If lectures were more engaging I'd give her a 4.5, instead of the 3. For exams read both her lecture notes and text.

Ashley is a fair professor and if you put in the necessary effort, you can do well. She's accessible, friendly, and approachable if you have any questions. The midterm and final require that you study lectures and articles, and know the key themes from the textbook. Would definitely take another course with her.
